msg: Should look for annotations all the way up the class hierarchy

author: vsiveton
msg: MPIR-115: Make the Sealed column optional in dependencies report
o sealed column is now display if one artifact is sealed

author: astitcher
msg: Some small changes which clean up header file inclusions
and generally start to tidy up the network layer so that it's
a bit easier to implement new network transports

author: mfreedman
msg: PORTLETBRIDGE-43 : MyFaces action handling sometimes fails with exception from ExternalContext setRequestCharacterSetEncoding
PORTLETBRIDGE-42 : Bridge not excluding bridge request attributes from its request scope
PORTLETBRIDGE-41 : EncodeActionURL doesn't encode valid nonFaces targets
PORTLETBRIDGE-40 : Redirect during render doesn't refresh properly
PORTLETBRIDGE-38 : Messages not maintained in insertion order as per JSF 1.2 spec
PORTLETBRIDGE-37 : VIEWSTATE_PARAM parsing in StateManager doesn't always work
This checkin fixes all the above problems in the portlet 1.0 codeline.  A separate checkin will follow in the future for the 2.0 codeline.
